author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

CRAB jobs have been failing to parse the job report because of this race condition.

This is related to https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/crab-jobs-failed-with-exit-code-50115/8567/19

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.

Fixes #37363
title: Make JobReport::reportReadBranches thread safe
